findings.message:
Contract locking ether found:
	Contract LoanToken (../..0x77f973fcaf871459aa58cd81881ce453759281bc.sol#336-391) has payable functions:
	 - LoanToken.fallback() (../..0x77f973fcaf871459aa58cd81881ce453759281bc.sol#347-362)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
findings.name: locked-ether
